ygData.subject: RE: Guard killing  WAS hero bracer quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Blocking the zone is illegal, yes. That s understandable. Helping the guards in their fight should NOT be illegal. If your fighting my brethren, I m gonna do
ygData.messageBody:
Blocking the zone is illegal, yes. That's understandable.

Helping the guards in their fight should NOT be illegal. If your fighting my
brethren, I'm gonna do what I can to see that you all DIE (which is SQUAT
since I can't do crap to a NPC sides kill them). If I could, I'd SoW all the
Barbarian guards, buff them with a Talisman of Tanarg, heal them, quickness
them, etc etc.


And, as far as I know, Barbarian guards are mostly left alone, and I'm never
there anyways... Qeynos guards can bite my ass, as well as all the other
races guards. Kill them if you want ;-) I was kill Troll guards last night!

And, if I blocked the zone on purpose to 'assit' the guards, I'd expect to
be banned.... That's lame.


-----Original Message-----
From: Lanadina the Magician [mailto:lanadina@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 9:53 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Guard killing WAS hero bracer quest


From: "Lanadina the Magician" <lanadina@...>

Keptin,

Training guards and what not on you and blocking the zones is ILLEGAL. I am
a dark elf myself, and had a few friends of the 'good'aligned races come
into Neriak's foreign quarters killing the guards. A few dark elves and
trolls decided to start training NPCs on them, and the trolls BLOCKED the
zone. No one could leave unless they gated or evaced.

A GM was called on the scene, and the players harrassing were given an
official warning. My barbarian friend had died because of this zone
blocking, causing him to lose his level.

Roleplaying is one thing...causing people to die, and harrassing them is a
totally different story.

Lanadina
